name: The_Hospital
description:
THE HOSPITAL

WIP Game

After finding yourself trapped in a nameless hospital, you are forced to make your way through the eerie environment to uncover the horrible secrets held within the cold walls and find a way to escape. Currently a work in progress, The Hospital draws inspiration the dark and unique environments previously established by timeless classics, like the Silent Hill and the Resident Evil series.

The game is currently very short, but development is active and consistent.

Made by Creative Director Preston Bready(John)
